description:
Author of Make It Nice and former Real Housewife of New York Dorinda Medley stops by Everything Iconic to talk about her new book, life after RHONY, whether or not she would want to return, and so much more!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
